gobblin.converter

Class Converter<SI,SO,DI,DO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<SI,SO,DI,DO>
  • Type Parameters:
    SI - input schema type
    SO - output schema type
    DI - input data type
    DO - output data type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class Converter<SI,SO,DI,DO>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, FinalState
    An interface for classes that implement data transformations, e.g., data type conversions, schema projections, data manipulations, data filtering, etc.

    This interface is responsible for converting both schema and data records. Classes implementing this interface are composible and can be chained together to achieve more complex data transformations.

      • convertSchema

        public abstract SO convertSchema(SI inputSchema,
                                 WorkUnitState workUnit)
                          throws SchemaConversionException
        Convert an input schema to an output schema.

        Schema conversion is limited to have a 1-to-1 mapping between the input and output schema.

        Parameters:
        inputSchema - input schema to be converted
        workUnit - a WorkUnitState object carrying configuration properties
        Returns:
        converted output schema
        Throws:
        SchemaConversionException - if it fails to convert the input schema

      • convertRecord

        public abstract java.lang.Iterable<DO> convertRecord(SO outputSchema,
                                                     DI inputRecord,
                                                     WorkUnitState workUnit)
                                              throws DataConversionException
        Convert an input data record to an Iterable of output records conforming to the output schema of convertSchema(SI, gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState).

        Record conversion can have a 1-to-0 mapping, 1-to-1 mapping, or 1-to-many mapping between the input and output records as long as all the output records conforms to the same converted schema.

        Converter for data record, both record type conversion, and record manipulation conversion.

        Parameters:
        outputSchema - output schema converted using the convertSchema(SI, gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState) method
        inputRecord - input data record to be converted
        workUnit - a WorkUnitState object carrying configuration properties
        Returns:
        converted data record
        Throws:
        DataConversionException - if it fails to convert the input data record

      • getFinalState

        public State getFinalState()
        Get final state for this object. By default this returns an empty State, but concrete subclasses can add information that will be added to the task state.
        Specified by:
        getFinalState in interface FinalState
        Returns:
        Empty State.
